abstract: NCAA files formal allegations against University of North Carolina in decades-long scandal involving athletes taking phony classes.
lead_paragraph: The university’s chancellor and its athletic director said they would release the allegations when a redacted version, protecting privacy rights, was available.

headline.main: North Carolina Receives Notice of Allegations From N.C.A.A.
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Colleges; Formal Allegations Leveled at U.N.C.

snippet: The university’s chancellor and its athletic director said they would release the allegations when a redacted version, protecting privacy rights, was available.
